page.title: 05OXFORD UNITED 2
page.content: expectations of their club in the First Division. 52% thought it would end up the season in the top ten; 8 people thought it would carry off the League Cup. The Chairman, Robert Maxwell, is a very controversial person, but support for him was strong. 68% thought that he was the best Chairman for Oxford United; only 40% were satisfied with the City Council's policies towards the club. Although Oxford United's need to have a ground with much more accommodation for spectators is generally acknowledged, 26% did not want to see the club move from the Manor. Opinion as to whether a new ground should be in Botley or at the Peartree roundabout was evenly split. Who were the supporters' favourite players? Aldridge came top with l6 votes. Runners-up were Langan,Trewick and Brock (9 votes each)
